Description: Circular black steatite votive patera; inside are three relief busts of Serapis, Isis and another figure wearing a tall headdress, below are two erotes, scene surrounded by six bunches-of-grapes; volutes(chipped) project from the rim; rosette surrounded by foliate patterns on the underside.
